function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underfunded municipal public services leading to inadequate maintenance of green spaces","Impact":"Decreased accessibility and quality of green spaces, increased risk of public health issues related to poor maintenance","Mitigation":"Increase funding and resources allocation to municipal public services specifically for the maintenance of urban green spaces","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents, visitors, and public health at risk","Owner":"Municipal government, public service agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of public restrooms in municipal green spaces","Impact":"Inconvenience for park visitors, potential health and sanitation issues, increased risk of public health issues related to lack of facilities","Mitigation":"Install and maintain public restrooms in municipal green spaces, implement regular sanitation and cleaning schedules","Technologies":"Sanitation facilities, cleaning equipment, waste management systems","People":"Park visitors, public health at risk","Owner":"Municipal government, public service agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in funding sources and management autonomy of public service agencies","Impact":"Variance in quality of maintenance and services, potential for inequality in access to well-maintained green spaces","Mitigation":"Standardize funding sources and management structures for public service agencies responsible for maintenance of urban green spaces, establish clear performance indicators and regulations","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents and visitors at risk of unequal access to well-maintained green spaces","Owner":"Government authorities, regulatory bodies"}]}
